mapper.sql: id, create_time, email, password, phone, realname, salt, status, username, org_id, parent_id, address, identity_cards, cards_front, cards_back, bank, bank_account, bank_name, alipay_account, alipay_name, pay_type, bak, (select count(1) from security_user oo where oo.parent_id = nn.id) as nodes, GET_USER_NAME(nn.parent_id) as parentName
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from security_user nn
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.delete: delete from security_user nn where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into security_user (id, create_time, email, password, phone, realname, salt, status, username, org_id, parent_id, address, identity_cards, cards_front, cards_back, bank, bank_account, bank_name, alipay_account, alipay_name, pay_type, bak) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityCards,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardsFront,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardsBack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alipayAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alipayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bak,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select:
select
from security_user nn WHERE FIND_IN_SET(id, AGENT_TREE(#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}))

select count(ss.id) as org_id,DATE_FORMAT(ss.create_time,'%Y%m%d') as parent_id from security_user s
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ss.create_time,'%Y%m%d')
